title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog - UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog - UI suggestions

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (see perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB:
The 'Add' button is adding a hidden entry in the associated editors.
Entries already existing in the associated editors are available for selection.
EB:
The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry.
Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

1. Go to the 'WorkbenchFile Editors' preference page.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors'. (There should still be no selection)
4. Press 'OK'. This adds the selected external editor.
